text: Forms of the Hebrew berit are translated in most passages as covenant; twice in this verse.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: A talent is approximately 75.4 pounds or 34.2 kilograms of silver.

name: Berean Standard Bible
text: Forms of the Hebrew cherem refer to the giving over of things or persons to the LORD, either by destroying them or by giving them as an offering.
